description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play retro asteroids by yourself, or with up to three other people! Jordans Asteroids includes ten fun and challenging levels of asteroids.
description.short: Play retro asteroids by yourself, or with up to three other people! Jordans Asteroids includes ten fun and challenging levels of asteroids.
